ul.li: Using full qualified names increased database footprint
..which can be reduced by putting property_names into dictionary
End-to-end validation

header.h3: Create Team Branch & Fix FAT's & merge into "Real" TRUNK (done done)

ul.li: Create team branch with merged 2 functionalities delivered in earlier sprints:
ttom model 3_10
Reduce footprint
Merge this branch into coredb trunk
Load mds for belgium for testing
Fix read only FAT tests
Release version of all coredb components
New coredb released components
Enable other teams to work with latest model

header.h3: Use TTom Allcodes in Tif2TTom instead of TTom core

ul.li: Remove shared model (component) dependencies between Tif2Mn and Tif2TTom.
Able to release Tif2MN without dependencies to Tif2TTom.
Enabler to make model changes to non TTom-Core components without breaking existing TIf2Mn.
E.g: Update name model for TTOM-Poi.
Enable Road element merging in TIF2TTOM toolbox
Write a method to justify road element merging
Implemented reasons: Why these roads can not be merged
All junctions should have reason to be there(valency > 2, loop, attribute difference, house number etc)
Release TIF2TTOM with road element merging
Checked raod element merging worked
Validated merging: All junctions coming out of haystack-validation have reason of not getting merged
Validated full stack with road element merging

header.h3: Model update: Names.Group all changes - Region ON/AN

ul.li: Area features now extend "Feature With Mandatory Name" or "Feature With Optional Name"
Tif2TTom adapted to create Common Name Set attributes
TTOM 3.11
Release of Tif2TTom
All area features now have the same name attribute structure
